product.descriptionTitle: Swiss Velvet Baby Carrier Aramis Code 6005
product.descriptionText: When you want both your baby to be calm and be able to do your tasks comfortably, a good baby carrier really becomes your best friend. The Swiss velvet baby carrier Aramis is one of those models that gives a good feeling from the first moment; the softness of the velvet and the baby being placed at the closest distance to the mother makes your little one feel safe and calm. For walking, shopping, daily tasks or even putting the baby to sleep... this carrier is really helpful and saves the mother from long hugs and fatigue.
product.fullDescriptionTitle: Swiss Velvet Baby Carrier Aramis Code 6005
product.fullDescriptionText:
When you want both your baby to be calm and be able to do your tasks comfortably, a good baby carrier really becomes your best friend. The Swiss velvet baby carrier Aramis is one of those models that gives a good feeling from the first moment; the softness of the velvet and the baby being placed at the closest distance to the mother makes your little one feel safe and calm. For walking, shopping, daily tasks or even putting the baby to sleep... this carrier is really helpful and saves the mother from long hugs and fatigue.

Important Features of Swiss Aramis Carrier
Soft velvet material: Its contact with the baby's skin is very gentle and does not irritate at all.
Ergonomic Swiss form: The baby's body is placed in the best position and is completely close to the mother.
Proper neck and back support: Very important for the first months and this model covers it completely.
Easy to fasten and adjust: You put it on quickly, adjust it easily and it's fully compatible with the mother's size.
Lightweight and portable: Fits in the bag and is always with you.
Suitable for long-term use: Both the mother gets less tired and the baby stays more comfortable.

Comparison with Similar Models
If you have tried different carriers, you probably saw that some of them are very stiff and rough and irritate the baby's skin. Or they are so loose that the baby constantly moves and does not calm down. Some models are also so complicated to fasten that each use is a serious adventure.

But the Swiss velvet baby carrier Aramis Code 6005 is exactly the opposite of all these troubles. The softness of its velvet gives an excellent feeling to the baby's skin, its Swiss form keeps the baby's body firm and at the same time comfortable, and fastening and adjusting it is very simple. This combination makes the mother have less stress and daily use be much easier for her

Why is this product a better choice?
If you are looking for a baby bedding that both calms your baby and simplifies your daily life, this carrier model is really a reliable choice. The soft velvet material makes its contact very pleasant for the baby's skin and its ergonomic form helps your little one be placed in the best condition close to your body. On the other hand, being lightweight and easy to fasten makes it useful for any situation from going out to simple tasks inside the house. In the end, the most important thing is that the baby feels more closeness and security; something that is vital for him in the first months and most relaxing for the mother.
